metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
List of Kubernetes namespaces to exclude from policy evaluation. Providing a value for this parameter is optional.

List of Sysctl Interfaces that pods cannot use. Use * for a wildcard match. E.g. kernel* will forbid any interface starting with kernel. * on its own will forbid all interfaces. For more information, please refer https://aka.ms/k8s-policy-sysctl-interfaces
